main event: A witness observed a large, white, round object that hovered or floated in the sky near Palos Verdes, California for about 20 seconds, then moved at an extremely rapid rate of speed in a southwesterly direction before disappearing completely from sight.
interesting points: The object appeared to be about 20-25 feet in diameter, was quite brilliant and light in color, and gave the impression of being translucent or semi-transparent.
The object had no visible markings, protrusions, or wings of any kind.
Another witness saw an object that appeared to be disc-shaped, hovering silently at an estimated altitude of 1000 feet, with a brilliant white light in the center and a hazy glow around the edges.
The disc-shaped object was estimated to be about 50 to 100 feet in diameter and observed for about 5 minutes before silently accelerating and disappearing in the direction of the ocean.
Another report described an object that appeared to be a bright light, bigger than a star, which was stationary and then suddenly shot straight up and disappeared.
sighted object: A bright light, bigger than a star
